result.title: incidence is expected to continue
result.content:
incidence is expected to continue.Know whatEarly detection and early treatment of foot and mouth disease is preventable and curableFoot and mouth disease is generally mild, while the majority of patients the disease, often the first symptoms of fever, palms, soles and herpes rash (rash, redness around the can), oral herpes or ulcers, pain; some patients may be accompanied by cough, runny nose, loss of appetite, nausea, vomiting and headache and nike air max 95 bb hombre other symptoms; few patients sicker, may be complicated by encephalitis, meningitis, myocarditis, pneumonia, if not treated can be life threatening. Currently there is no vaccine, but as long as early detection, early treatment, is preventable and treatable.Hand, foot and mouth disease transmission and more, mainly through close contact with the patient's stool, herpes fluid and respiratory secretions (such as droplets from sneezing, etc.) and by contaminated hands, towels, handkerchiefs, tooth cups, toys, dishes, bottles , bedding, etc. are infected.HFMD common multiple in infants and children, 3 years and 3 years old infants more likely to get sick. Once infected adults generally not the disease, but also without any symptoms, but the infection can spread the virus.If you had hand, foot and mouth disease, most cases can be 7 to 10 days to heal itself without sequelae, it will not leave scars on the skin. Based on past incidence and cure the situation, the individual may occur in patients with severe meningitis, pneumonia, etc., as long as actively cooperate with medical treatment, most can be cured.In

recent years, due to individual events are infinite zoom, the image of urban management and law enforcement personnel "cure" or even seriously "demonized." "Blacksmith needs its own hardware," Municipal Law Enforcement Secretary Yan Shi said, pay close attention to urban management team and work style building is a priority, but also the long-term of the policy. To this end, yesterday, chased Systems Conference arrangements "IV" urban management law enforcement team building, called out "the city wants to manage, have to nike air max 90 em hombre baratas manage their." Municipal Law Enforcement Bureau decided to take two years to carry out the "learn innovative, service-oriented management, law enforcement specification type, clean harmonious" urban management law enforcement team-building activities in the city's urban management law enforcement system. Municipal Law Enforcement Bureau request intensive law enforcement team for at least six books a year, no less than 10,000 words written study notes. "The purpose of urban management should be integrated into the city to more people and create conditions for small vendors to be managed, but to serve." Yan Shi said.He recommended three books to the law enforcement team, "City of Victory", "big and little things" and "Chong Kee out of the beam." "These books will help us understand how the city is going," the Liang Chong Kee "recorded dozens of decades working out the characters, let us understand the function and future trend of the city." Yan Shi said.Municipal Law Enforcement Bureau to improve service delivery to the public to the city's urban management and law enforcement system, "Secretary Reception Day," opened Municipal Law Enforcement Bureau, "the official micro-Bo." And before the end of the year,

complete with front-line law enforcement officers full law enforcement recorder.Regulatory >>Problems associated direct leadership teamAs requested, the inspectors must be certified law enforcement officers, Municipal Law Enforcement Bureau of the branch without obtaining law enforcement credentials personnel are not allowed independent law enforcement; All "122" city management supervisors are not allowed to participate in law enforcement.In terms of the rectification of the disciplinary committee of the Municipal Law Enforcement Bureau Feng Silver said, to abandon the city inspectors is managing people,nike air max 2014 mujer fine misconceptions. Corrective and investigate the dictates of law enforcement officers on the job, Chinakayao eliminate brutal law enforcement, as well as law enforcement agencies issued a fine individual grassroots indicators booth fee charged to act as "umbrella", destroying misconduct withheld materials. If the above behavior, preliminary investigation is true, for all the direct leadership of the first suspended and then thoroughly investigate the deal, the parties Esen stopped working positions, and then conduct a thorough investigation processing. The problem is serious, adverse impact on the recovery levels.The city's urban management law enforcement team will be unhealthy practices that hurt public interests "zero tolerance" and to establish a sound and elimination system.Supervision >>Settles complaint 7 daysFormer deputies Weinan City, Weinan Hongyuan Automobile Sales Co., Ltd.
